item.title: Problem Set 1
item.description: Life expectancy in 2007 library(tidyverse) # This loads ggplot2, dplyr, and other packages you'll need library(gapminder) # This loads the gapminder data Letâ€™s first look at the first few rows of data: head(gapminder) ## # A tibble: 6 x 6 ## country continent year lifeExp pop gdpPercap ## <fct> <fct> <int> <dbl> <int> <dbl> ## 1 Afghanistan Asia 1952 28.8 8425333 779. ## 2 Afghanistan Asia 1957 30.3 9240934 821.
